```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

df_911 <- read.csv(here("Data", "Seattle_small_911.csv"))
 
df_911 |>
  group_by(Type)|>
  summarise(count = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(count))
```

```{r}
clean_911 <- df_911 |>
  mutate(Datetime = mdy_hms(Datetime),
         Year = year(Datetime),
         Month = months(Datetime)) |>
  filter(Year == 2023)
```



```{r}
difftime(clean_911$Datetime[1], clean_911$Datetime[2])
```
